twitter

Class Tweeter

  • java.lang.Object
    • twitter.TwitterBot
      • twitter.Tweeter

  • public class Tweeter
extends TwitterBot
    An easier to use Class for TwitterBot, hides some of the (probably) unneeded methods
    Author:
    Diarmuid Ryan

      Constructors

      Tweeter(java.lang.String configFilename)
      Sets up the TwitterBot

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tweeter

        public Tweeter(java.lang.String configFilename)
        Sets up the TwitterBot
        Parameters:
        configFilename - Address of a file in the resource directory containing the keys for this bot, if it doesn't exist it will be created

    • Method Detail

      • readTimeline

        public java.lang.String readTimeline()
        Gets a representation of the users Twitter timeline
        Returns:
        A string representation of the users timeline

      • post

        public void post(java.lang.String p)
        Posts a string to the user's Twitter Account
        Parameters:
        p - The string to be posted. Should be less than 140 characters or 117 characters and a URL
